lines: 1. Mogoroba kobwairire,Abarwaire bachire,Ang'e naye Omonene,Basabire obakonye.
2. Naintwe bono mogoroba,Twachire n'obob'obonge,Nonya titokorochi aye,Twamanyire nao ore.
3. Omotoria seri'obwoba,'Bande nabarwaire bare,'Bande mbaragwancha buya,Abande babosiririe.
4. 'Nde tari nogotimoka,Taiy'otakoreti ebibe'Bakogokorera buyaBeigwa mbanyabibe bare.
5. 'Koboko kwao nkwa nguru,Ng'ana yao tekogwa bosaIgwa bono mogoroba,Ase obuya togwenie.
